title: Grow your savings with high FD rates on Bajaj Finance Fixed Deposit - ANI News
content: Grow your savings with high FD rates on Bajaj Finance Fixed Deposit  ANI News
description: Pune (Maharashtra) [India], April 1 (ANI/NewsVoir): Investing a sizeable corpus of money in an excellent financial tool like a fixed deposit over a longer tenor can yield a generous amount at maturity. It can help you grow your idle savings and even beat inflation. Since the payout isn't affected by market movements, you can calculate your expected returns and align your investments as per your financial plan.
